org.spongepowered.api.item.inventory.slots

Interface FilteringSlot

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Inventory, java.lang.Iterable<Inventory>, Nameable, Slot
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    EquipmentSlot, FuelSlot, InputSlot

    public interface FilteringSlot
extends Slot
    An inventory slot which can only accept certain types of item.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isValidItem(ItemStack stack)
      Check whether the supplied item can be inserted into this slot.

      Check whether the supplied item can be inserted into this slot.

    • Method Detail

      • isValidItem

        boolean isValidItem(ItemStack stack)
        Check whether the supplied item can be inserted into this slot. Returning false from this method implies that Inventory.offer(org.spongepowered.api.item.inventory.ItemStack) would always return false for this item.
        Parameters:
        stack - ItemStack to check
        Returns:
        true if the stack is valid for this slot

      • isValidItem

        boolean isValidItem(ItemType type)
        Check whether the supplied item can be inserted into this slot. Returning false from this method implies that Inventory.offer(org.spongepowered.api.item.inventory.ItemStack) would always return false for items of this type.
        Parameters:
        type - ItemType to check
        Returns:
        true if the item type is valid for this slot
